item.description:
How are you creating the life you desire? What books, movies or manifestations have you experienced this month? Join us for a fun night of sharing!

Due to the size of the room, we are accepting yes or no responses only. If you respond yes and find you can no longer attend, please change your response in order to create space for someone else to join us. We appreciate your understanding that we choose to keep our meeting limited to 16 attendees. Thank you for joining us!
item.how_to_find_us: We meet in the private room in the back from 7pm.-9p.m..

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: P.M. L.O.A. Meetup
